idea-plugin.name: Suggest Library
idea-plugin.description:
The SuggestLibrary plugin is a tool that suggests useful libraries to users based on their project's dependencies. It analyzes the user's pom.xml file and sends it to a recommendation API, which returns a list of recommended libraries. The plugin adds a "Suggest Libraries" button to the main menu bar of IntelliJ IDEA, allowing users to quickly explore and select the libraries that best fit their needs.
With SuggestLibrary, you can save time and effort by automating the process of finding and selecting libraries for your project. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, SuggestLibrary can help you discover new and relevant libraries that can improve your project's functionality and performance.
Note: Some recommended libraries may not be compatible with your project. Please use caution when selecting and integrating new libraries.
